name: declti
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: breqtrri(c0, clt, cdc(c1, c2), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, clt, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wbr(c0, clt, co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))
-| wceq(cdc(c1, c2), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wbr(c0, clt, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wbr(c0, clt, co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))
-| wceq(cdc(c1, c2), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))

body.origin:
|- wbr(c0, clt, co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))
-| wcel(cdc(nat1, nat0), cn)
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

-| wcel(c1, cn)

-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

|- wbr(c0, clt, cdc(c1, c2))
-| wceq(cdc(c1, c2), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))
-| wcel(c1, cn)
-| wcel(c2, cn0)
-| wcel(c0, cn0)
-| wbr(c0, clt, cdc(nat1, nat0))

body.origin: |- wceq(cdc(c1, c2), co(co(cdc(nat1, nat0), cmul, c1), caddc, c2))
